annonstext:
About us

SwedQ is a young consulting company under rapid growth. Our business idea is to provide consultants who wants to work with bleeding edge technologies and companies that brings value to the world. The three corner stones of SwedQ is Competence, Tech & Business Understanding and Ownership, therefore we are making sure that everyone who joins our family gets the right conditions to develop their skills, network and career. Our assignments and solutions are provided throughout all types of industries, but our main focus is within the IT sector, so the assignments varies depending on your experience. For now, our consultants are working on everything from implementing a new architecture of a cloud solution, to helping to set up the new back end system for autonomous vehicles.

Description

For this particular role you will require a seniority of at least 5 years of experience, during this time you should have been exposed to both Front and Back End technologies. The reason for that is because you will work through the clients backlog that consist of tasks that requires you to navigate throug the whole stack.

The client works within the Health sector and their intentions is to grow within new market segments. Therefore their infrstructure requires to handle the fast rate of their expansion. This opportunity is a good place for somebody who wants to strengthen their experience within the latest technologies.

Requirements

- React, React Redux

- JavaScript, HTML5, CSS

- Java 8, Spring Boot, REST, Vert.x

- AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, CloudFront, RDS)

- CI/CD - Jenkins, Team City, Octopus Deploy

- Microservices

- Kubernetes, Docker

Why SwedQ?

- Competitive salary
- wellbeing in health
- 25 days of paid vacation
- Monthly payments into your additional pension fund
- A wellbeing budget to spend as you please
- Generous Developers budget, to be spent on conferences, additional tooling, education, licenses or gadgets
- Organized Knowledge days 3x a year (Knowabungas)
- Knowledge tribes, pooling knowledge and interests together
- Developers time, to use during work hours for your personal growth
- Flexible working hours
- Occasional work from home
- Unlimited coffee, soft drinks, craft beers, fruit and snacks
- Unbeatable business support function
- Voluntary participation in international trips and team buildings
- Summer family BBQ, Christmas party, after works, meetups
- Support for open source projects and community engagements
- Supporting your creative ideas and ambitions
- Carefully selected and challenging projects
- Working with international clients and known mature startups
- Working on startup projects within SwedQ Works ventures
- Kick-ass colleagues and mentors at every corner
- Scandinavian approach including a flat organization without an excessive hierarchy
